nodes.text: The Festival of Awakening was a festival that was celebrated by the Pilgrims of Tython by the time they settled on Tython in the years of the Cold War. Among the Twi'leks, it was known that children took part in the festivities. The actions of Nalen Raloch who managed to repel Flesh Raider incursions allowed the Pilgrims to celebrate the Festival of Awakening.
